price: 68. En als zij met jou argumenteren, zeg: “Allah weet het beste wat jullie doen.”
arabic: وَإِن جَٰدَلُوكَ فَقُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-in jādalūka faquli al-lahu aʿlamu bimā taʿmalūna
